title: Samsung Galaxy Ring is getting new sizes
description: Samsung's Galaxy Ring is getting two new sizes next month, according to a new rumor from a tipster over on X. The smart wearable will finally be able to accommodate larger (thicker?) fingers come January, with size 14 and size 15 joining the others. The size 14 Galaxy Ring will have an inner diameter of 23mm, and has the model number SM-Q514. The size 15 ring has a 23.8mm inner diameter and the model number SM-Q515. Both devices weigh 3.2g. These new sizes have been first rumored to arrive within a few weeks all the way back in September, so it's certainly taken Samsung a long time...
excerpt: If you've been waiting for a larger version, you're in luck. Samsung's Galaxy Ring is getting two new sizes next month, according to a new rumor from a...
text: Samsung's Galaxy Ring is getting two new sizes next month, according to a new rumor from a tipster over on X. The smart wearable will finally be able to accommodate larger (thicker?) fingers come January, with size 14 and size 15 joining the others. The size 14 Galaxy Ring will have an inner diameter of 23mm, and has the model number SM-Q514. The size 15 ring has a 23.8mm inner diameter and the model number SM-Q515. Both devices weigh 3.2g. These new sizes have been first rumored to arrive within a few weeks all the way back in September, so it's certainly taken Samsung a long time to get these to market - provided, of course, that the company had initially planned to launch them in September. Anyway, they're supposedly almost here now, so if the only reason you haven't yet bought a Galaxy Ring is that you needed a size 14 or 15, it's probably time to start saving up. If you want to learn more about Samsung's first smart ring, don't miss our review. Source
html:
Samsung's Galaxy Ring is getting two new sizes next month, according to a new rumor from a tipster over on X. The smart wearable will finally be able to accommodate larger (thicker?) fingers come January, with size 14 and size 15 joining the others.

The size 14 Galaxy Ring will have an inner diameter of 23mm, and has the model number SM-Q514. The size 15 ring has a 23.8mm inner diameter and the model number SM-Q515. Both devices weigh 3.2g.

These new sizes have been first rumored to arrive within a few weeks all the way back in September, so it's certainly taken Samsung a long time to get these to market - provided, of course, that the company had initially planned to launch them in September.

Anyway, they're supposedly almost here now, so if the only reason you haven't yet bought a Galaxy Ring is that you needed a size 14 or 15, it's probably time to start saving up. If you want to learn more about Samsung's first smart ring, don't miss our review.

Source
